meanings.sent1: The artist displayed a modified painting at the gallery.
meanings.sent2: The car had a modified exhaust system for better performance.
meanings.sent3: The modified recipe for chocolate cake included extra cocoa.
meanings.sent4: Her modified hairstyle turned heads wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The modified costume made him look like a superhero.

meanings.sent1: The modified document had new information added.
meanings.sent2: The modified photo had filters applied for a vintage look.
meanings.sent3: The modified story had a surprise ending that shocked everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her modified speech resonated with the audience in a unique way.
meanings.sent5: The modified painting captured the essence of the artist's emotions.

meanings.definition: Adjusted or adapted for a specific purpose
meanings.sent1: The modified schedule allowed for more study time.
meanings.sent2: The modified training program catered to individual needs.
meanings.sent3: The modified game rules made it more challenging and fun.
meanings.sent4: Her modified laptop setup improved productivity at work.
meanings.sent5: The modified design of the building enhanced its functionality.
